FY23 Q3 - Section 5 - Critical Software

DETAILS:

Implementing IPv6

Please answer the following questions related to the requirements of OMB Memorandum M-21-07, Completing the Transition to Internet Protocol Version 6 (IPv6).

Number of GFE hardware assets (from 1.2.1-1.2.3):[24]

5.1 That only have IPv4 operational

5.2 That have both IPv4 and IPv6 operational

5.3 That only have IPv6 operational

[24] Note that 5.1 + 5.2 + 5.3 must add up to the total number of GFE hardware assets from 1.2.1 â€“ 1.2.3.

VALIDATIONS:
The sum of (5.1-5.3) should not exceed 1.2

The sum of 5.1, 5.2, and 5.3 should equal 1.2

REQUIREMENT SOURCE:
OMB and DHS/CISA
